label: Power of the Great
i_ching_name: Da Zhuang / The Power of the Great

shadow.name: FORCE
shadow.description: Using power to dominate, bulldozing through obstacles
shadow.somatic_signature: Jaw tension, chest thrust forward, combative stance
shadow.thought_pattern: I'll make this happen through sheer will.

gift.name: STRENGTH
gift.description: Natural power expressed in right timing, sustainable force
gift.behavioral_signature: Patient power, waiting for the right moment to act
gift.thought_pattern: I have the power. I wait for the invitation.

siddhi.name: MAJESTY
siddhi.description: Divine power that serves universal unfolding
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Effortless impact, presence that commands respect
siddhi.thought_pattern: Power flows through me. I am not the doer.
siddhi.emotional_state: Humility in power, servant to the flow

inversion_protocols.script: You are not blocked. You are being asked to wait. Gate 34 is the archetype of the kingâ€”power that acts when invited, not imposed. When you force, you waste the very power you're trying to express. True strength waits for the right timing. Your job is to be ready, not to push.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel the tension in your jaw and shoulders. Soften. Drop the push. Feel the power beneath the force.

experiment.hypothesis: If I stop forcing and wait for invitation, my actions will have more impact.
experiment.action: For 3 days, do not initiate. Respond only to clear invitations. Notice the power in restraint.

success_criteria.target: Actions taken feel more potent and effortless
